titleStmt.title: The truest relation of the Earle of Straffords speech on the scaffold on Tower-hill, before he was beheaded, May 12. 1641. Together with his deportment before and at the end of his execution
titleStmt.author: Strafford, Thomas Wentworth, Earl of, 1593-1641.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
